text: The water level in the Mettur Dam stood at 71.90 feet on Saturday against its full level of 120 feet. The storage level of the dam was 34.353 tmc against its full capacity of 93.470 tmc. The dam was receiving an inflow of 115 cusecs. About 5,000 cusecs of water is being released from the dam for farm activities in Cauvery Delta districts.
title: Mettur level
